content.query:
USE nyc_green_taxi_ldw
GO
--Compaigns Requirement
SELECT TOP(100)
    td.year,
    td.month,
    tz.borough,
    CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date,
    cal.day_name AS trip_day,
    CASE WHEN cal.day_name IN ('Saturday','Sunday') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS trip_day_weekend,
    SUM(CASE WHEN pt.payment_type_desc='Credit card' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS card_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN pt.payment_type_desc='Cash' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cash_count


FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green AS td
JOIN silver.taxi_zone tz ON (td.PULocationID=tz.LocationID) 
JOIN silver.calendar cal ON (cal.date=CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime))
JOIN silver.payment_type pt ON (td.payment_type=pt.payment_type)
WHERE td.year='2020' AND td.month='01'
GROUP BY td.year,
        td.month,
        tz.borough,
        CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime),
        cal.day_name ;
